block.p: MAHONEY-David. A memorial service for David Mahoney, Chairman and CEO of the Charles A. Dana Foundation, will be held on Wednesday, May 17, at 11AM at St. Jean the Baptiste Church, 184 East 76th Street (entrance at Lexington Avenue) in New York City. Mr. Mahoney died on May 1, 2000. In lieu of flowers, contributions may be made to the Harvard-Mahoney Neuroscience Institute, Harvard Medical School, 25 Shattuck St, Boston, MA. 02115
